title: Why Is It Impossible To Make A Good Hulk Movie?
description:
Over the years The Incredible Hulk has seen several attempts at a solo Hulk outing.  Some have been more successful than others, but with the rights to the iconic character spread thin, the MCU has yet to give us a stand alone Hulk movie.  Why has Marvel Studios been unable to produce a standalone Hulk movie?  And will we ever see Bruce Banner in his own movie?

#marvel #incrediblehulk #brucebanner #nerdstalgic
